newsitem.title: UK: Cazenove Indian GDR Index up 3.25 percent.
newsitem.headline: Cazenove Indian GDR Index up 3.25 percent.

text.p: The Cazenove Indian GDR Index rose 2.40 points, 3.25 percent, to 76.24 points after the Bombay Stock Exchange 30 share index rose 33.89 points to a provisional 3,315.38.
The premium for GDRs over stocks on the local market was 10.56 percent after yesterday's 7.55 percent.
The Cazenove index is a capitalisation weighted basket of Indian global depositary receipts and measures the change from midday on the previous trading day to midday today.
